title: ‘Peak SF’ on a Friday Night Is a Robot Fight
description: The artificial intelligence boom, which has brought techies flocking back to the city, has fueled a resurgence of live — and sometimes futuristic — events.
content: Inside an underground boxing ring, a jab by a humanoid robot sent the other humanoid robot stumbling backward. The audience roared as the referee slapped the mat to count the knock out. In a rumbling voice, the announcer rallied the crowd to pump the... [1611 chars]

title: Younger Workers Will Win the AI Economy
description: Artificial intelligence is slowing hiring for junior roles, but history suggests young workers are often best placed to adapt to new technology.

title: Assistant AG Gail Slater: MAGA Antitrust Enforcement Will Ensure Open Flow of Information, Bias-Free AI
description: Assistant Attorney General Gail Slater said during a speech on Thursday that America First Antitrust can be used to ensure that free information flows in American democracy and that artificial intelligence (AI) remains free of bias.
content:
Assistant Attorney General Gail Slater said during a speech on Thursday that America First Antitrust can be used to ensure free information flows in American democracy and that artificial intelligence (AI) remains free of viewpoint bias.

title: IBM And BharatGen Collaborate On Accelerating AI Powered By Indic LLMs
description: IBM and BharatGen have inked a strategic collaboration to advance the adoption of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in India powered by BharatGen’s sovereign multimodal and Large Language Models (LLMs). BharatGen claims these LLMs are tailored to India’s unique linguistic and cultural landscape. The collaboration aims to bring together IBM's AI expertise in data, governance and model training technology, and BharatGen’s expertise to create inclusive, India-centric sovereign multimodal and LLMs.
content: IBM and BharatGen have inked a strategic collaboration to advance the adoption of artificial intelligence in India powered by BharatGen’s sovereign multimodal and large language models. BharatGen claims these LLMs are tailored to India’s unique lingu... [2638 chars]

title: China’s DeepSeek shook the tech world. Its developer just revealed the cost of training the AI model
description: Chinese artificial intelligence developer DeepSeek spent just $294,000 on training its R1 model, much less than reported for US rivals, it said in a paper that is likely to reignite debate over Beijing’s place in the AI race.
content:

description: Artificial intelligence can often feel distant or impersonal, but Klever Boy AI takes a different path: one that keeps people at the center of technology. title: Meta unveils smart glasses with apps and artificial intelligence assistant
description: MENLO PARK — Four years ago, when Meta released smart glasses that could take photos and videos, the product became a surprise hit. Since then, millions have snapped them up.
content:

title: L&T Tech expands global AI collaborations, partners with MIT Media Lab
description: L&T Technology Services (LTTS) has partnered with MIT Media Lab to advance next-generation artificial intelligence and sustainable engineering solutions. The collaboration will focus on Agentic AI, AGI applications, mobility innovation, and greener infrastructure.

title: AI in Tech Recruitment: How Automation is Streamlining Hiring without Sacrificing Human Judgment
description: Recruitment in the technology sector has always been fast-paced, competitive, and high-stakes. title: General Chauhan Advocates for Modern Defence Enhancements
description: General Anil Chauhan emphasized the need for developing equipment for space and cyber warfare, calling for a strategic selection of weapons and updated R&D to meet modern demands. He highlighted the importance of expanding the defence manufacturing base and leveraging artificial intelligence to achieve self-reliance in defence.
